name: Ise & Kai: Chosen Throne
description:
A woman named Seina just wants to enjoy life. Yet, she experiences difficulties from an  alternative world!?

I did this game for Otome Jam 2019! I'd be elated if you enjoy it!

Please keep in mind this game is still a prototype, and I will eventually release another update that'll included updated assets at a later date. I will also update this page at that time.
